results.description: Borussia Monchengladbach return to the top of Bundesliga with a 4-2 win over Eintracht Frankfurt.
results.shortTitle: Monchengladbach beat Eintracht to go top
results.title: Borussia Monchengladbach 4-2 Eintracht Frankfurt: Gladbach go back to top of table

thumbnail.altText: Denis Zakaria celebrates with his teammates after scoring Borussia Moenchengladbach's fourth goal against Eintracht Frankfurt.

results.description: Chris Smalling concedes a controversial 93rd minute penalty as Roma are held to a 1-1 draw by Borussia Monchengladbach in the Europa League.
results.shortTitle: Smalling concedes late penalty in Roma draw
results.title: Roma 1-1 Borussia Mönchengladbach: Chris Smalling concedes controversial late penalty

results.description: Augsburg goalkeeper Tomas Koubek has a howler during his team's 5-1 defeat to Borussia Monchengladbach.
results.title: Bundesliga: Augsburg goalkeeper Tomas Koubek has howler against Monchengladbach

results.description: Timo Werner scores his first Bundesliga hat-trick as RB Leipzig beat Borussia Monchengladbach for a third win.
results.shortTitle: Werner scores hat-trick in Leipzig win
results.title: Timo Werner scores hat-trick in RB Leipzig win over Borussia Monchengladbach

results.description: Newly promoted Norwich City sign Switzerland striker Josip Drmic on a three-year deal from German side Borussia Monchengladbach.
results.title: Josip Drmic: Norwich City sign Borussia Monchengladbach & Switzerland striker

results.description: Borussia Dortmund sign Borussia Monchengladbach midfielder Thorgan Hazard and Bayer Leverkusen winger Julian Brandt on five-year deals.
results.shortTitle: Dortmund sign Thorgan Hazard and Julian Brandt
results.title: Borussia Dortmund sign Thorgan Hazard and Julian Brandt from Bundesliga rivals

results.description: Jadon Sancho says Borussia Dortmund will try again to win the Bundesliga after Bayern Munich pipped them to the crown after a thrilling race.
results.shortTitle: We will go for title again, says Sancho
results.title: Jadon Sancho: Borussia Dortmund will fight for title again

results.description: Bayern Munich host Eintracht Frankfurt and Borussia Dortmund travel to Borussia Monchengladbach - follow live text coverage of the final day of the German Bundesliga.
results.shortTitle: Bayern win to secure seventh straight Bundesliga title
results.title: Bundesliga - final day live: Bayern Munich v Eintracht Frankfurt & Borussia Monchengladbach v Borussia Dortmund

results.description: Bayern Munich cruise to victory at Borussia Moenchengladbach to go level with Bundesliga leaders Borussia Dortmund on points and games played.
results.title: Borussia Mönchengladbach 1-5 Bayern Munich

thumbnail.altText: Javi Martinez celebrates scoring against Borussia Moenchengladbach

results.description: Jadon Sancho scores as Borussia Dortmund bounce back from a first Bundesliga defeat of the season to beat Borussia Monchengladbach.
results.shortTitle: Sancho scores as Dortmund bounce back
results.title: Borussia Dortmund 2-1 Borussia Monchengladbach: Jadon Sancho scores in win

results.description: The official Twitter account for the Bundesliga tells Borussia Monchengladbach they can "have the league" if they get 50 million retweets on a post.
results.shortTitle: Gladbach can 'have the league' for 50m retweets
results.title: Borussia Monchengladbach can 'have the league' for 50m retweets

results.description: Three different players score hat-tricks as Borussia Monchengladbach thrash fifth-tier Hastedt in the German Cup.
results.shortTitle: Trio score hat-tricks in German Cup game
results.title: Borussia Monchengladbach win 11-1: Trio score hat-tricks in German Cup game

results.description: Tottenham winger Keanan Bennetts has completed a move to Bundesliga side Borussia Monchengladbach
results.title: Tottenham: Keanan Bennetts signs for Monchengladbach

results.description: Hamburg are relegated from the Bundesliga for the first time as fans delay the end of the match against Borussia Monchengladbach by throwing flares.
results.title: Hamburg relegated from Bundesliga as flares delay end of match

results.description: Bayern Munich come from behind to thrash Borussia Monchengladbach in their first Bundesliga game since wrapping up the title.
results.title: Bayern Munich 5-1 Borussia Monchengladbach

results.description: Bayern Munich lose to Borussia Monchengladbach, ending manager Jupp Heynckes' 30-game unbeaten run in the Bundesliga.
results.title: Borussia Monchengladbach 2-1 Bayern Munich

results.description: West Ham loanee Reece Oxford makes his debut for Borussia Monchengladbach as they come from a goal down to win at Hoffenheim.
results.title: 1899 Hoffenheim 1-3 Borussia Mönchengladbach

results.description: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang's hat-trick helps Borussia Dortmund thrash Borussia Monchengladbach to go two clear of Bayern Munich.
results.title: Borussia Dortmund 6-1 Borussia M'gladbach

results.description: Borussia Monchengladbach sign Germany defender Matthias Ginter from Borussia Dortmund for a reported £14.9m plus add-ons.
results.title: Matthias Ginter: Borussia Monchengladbach sign Dortmund defender

results.description: West Ham defender Reece Oxford joins German side Borussia Monchengladbach on a season-long loan deal.
results.title: Reece Oxford: West Ham defender signs for Borussia Monchengladbach on loan
